name: ThreeMinuteMeditation
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three minute meditation
des:
Three Minute Meditation provides multiple three minute mindfulness practices to help bring you back to the moment. It is recommended to set aside some time every day for some meditation to alleviate stress and clear your mind.

To begin your meditation invoke the skill with 'Open Three Minute Meditation' and follow the prompts. 

If you like this skill and find it to be a useful addition to your mindfulness practice we would really appreciate if you drop us a review! Any suggestions, questions, or bug reports are welcome at support@stokedskills.com. We'd love to hear your feedback so we can continue to improve our products. Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
